Html:
hello good day.

im new to PHPExcel.. ive created this application on PHP using the Excel 2007 with multiple sheets. works fine on windows machine but when i run to a linux machine with OO 3.0 beta installed.. it can open the file.. the problem is the data validation ive created... once i select from a data validation from sheet 1. it copies the selected value to all the sheets ive created on the same cell as sheet 1...

does anyone has experienced this? please help.. tenks..

Try to use OO Novell Build

www.go-oo.org
